scripts.make-react-app: npm create vite@latest frontend -- --template react && cd frontend && npm i react-router-dom axios && node ../configerFrontend.js && cd ..
scripts.make-server-app: mkdir backend && cd backend && npm init -y && npm i express cors pg jsonwebtoken dotenv nodemon bcrypt helmet express-rate-limit && node ../configerBackend.js && npm run makeServerDirectory && cd ..
scripts.shower:
echo 'All done!
You can type(in terminal):
npm run build-and-run to build and run the app.
Or npm run build-and-dev to build and run the app in development mode.'
scripts.init: npm run make-react-app && npm run make-server-app && npm run shower && cd ..
scripts.init-with-tailwind: npm run init && cd frontend && npm run useTailwindCss
scripts.init-and-run: npm run init && npm run build-and-run
scripts.init-and-dev: npm run init && npm run build-and-dev
scripts.build-and-run: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run start
scripts.build-and-dev: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && cd backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev-double-mac: cd frontend && open -a Terminal 'npm run dev' && cd ../backend && npm run dev
scripts.dev-double-windows: cd frontend && start cmd /k npm run dev && cd ../backend && npm run dev
scripts.build-and-run-for-render-server: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build-linux && cd .. && cd backend && npm run start
